document_data.caption: Shake it off.
document_data.name: Teyileri Siwifi
document_data.mainbody: '''Teyileri Siwifi''' was a wealthy young woman in [[Port Nyanzaru]], [[Chult]], during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: She had a bold sense of style and sought to impress those to whom she spoke, if not stun them into silence.
document_data.Relationships: Her father was a close associate of the [[Port Nyanzaru#Merchant Princes|merchant prince]] [[Wakanga O'tamu]], and she was known to spend time at the prince's villa to enjoy his menagerie.
document_data.History: During the events of the [[death curse]],{{ToA-time}} Teyileri was embarrassed while giving a toast when a man rudely interrupted her. Seeking to make sure it did not happen again, her best solution was to acquire three magnificent [[necklace]]s—fashioned from [[rubellite]], [[silverspruce]], and [[sphene]]—believing that wearing such items would clearly convey her importance. She therefore contacted the [[Tearah Initoo|Master of the Market]] to commission the pieces.
